channel.title: Need help with adding custom item stats! (using delta base)
channel.description:
ok, so I've spent so much time adding working d claws, correct models, even a working 4 hit special using dhally animation... but when you equip them they have no attack/defence/strength bonus. Every tutorial i've looked for talks about going into item.cfg and just adding (what would be for me) item = 8002 Dragon_Claws A_set_of_fighting_claws. 1 1 1 1 1 1 <~ (stats) but when I open my Item.Cfg this is what i see: [code]ÃŠÃ¾ÂºÂ¾ 2 Ã« G â€” F Ëœ â„¢ Å¡ F â€º F Å“ F Â F Å¾ F Å¸ F F Â¡ F Â¢ F Â£ F Â¤ F Â¥ F Â¦ F Â§ F Â¨ F Â© F Âª F Â« F Â¬BÃ‹+J F Â­ F Â® F Â¯ F Â° F Â± F Â² F Â³ F Â´ F Âµ F Â¶ F Â· F Â¸ F Â¹ F Âº F Â» F Â¼ F Â½ F Â¾ F Â¿ F Ã€ F Ã F Ã‚ F Ãƒ w I F Ã„ F Ã… Ã† Ã‡ Ãˆ 3 Ã‰ 2 ÃŠ 2 Ã‹ 2 ÃŒ Ã Ã Ã Ã Ã‘ Ã’ 9 Ã“ Ã” Ã• Ã– Ã— Ã˜ Ã™ Ãš Ã› Ãœ Ã amulets [I arrows body boots capes crackers fishing_big_net fishing_big_net_lvl fishing_big_net_xp fishing_fly fishing_fly_lvl fishing_fly_xp fishing_harpoon fishing_harpoon_lvl fishing_harpoon_xp fishing_net fishing_net_lvl fishing_net_xp fishing_rod1 fishing_rod1_lvl fishing_rod1_xp fishing_rod2 fishing_rod2_lvl fishing_rod2_xp Helm fullHelm fullMask gloves hats itemIsNote [Z itemSellable itemStackable itemTradeable itemTwoHanded legs normal_gems platebody rings shields Barrows Clue shilo_gems smithing_frame [[[I SmithingItems [[I <init> ()V Code LineNumberTable randomBarrows ()I randomClue isHelm (I)Z StackMapTable isFullHelm isFullMask isPlate randomAmulet randomArrows randomBody randomBoots randomCape randomGloves randomHat randomLegs randomNGems randomPHat randomRing randomSGems randomShield <clinit> Ã† Ã SourceFile Item.java x y q I Ã ÃŸ Ã r I a I b I c I n I H I J I K I L I M I d I e I l I m I N I o I s I p I O I P I Q I R I S I T I U I V I W I X I Y I Z I [ I \ I ] I ^ I _ I ` I f g h g i g j g k g t u v w java/io/FileInputStream java/io/File data/stackable.dat x Ã¡ x Ã¢ Ã£ } Ã¤ y java/io/IOException Ã¥ Ã¦ Ã§ 2Critical error while loading stackabledata! item.title: Need help with adding custom item stats! (using delta base)
item.dc:creator: @sergiypro sergiypro
item.description:
@sergiypro wrote:

umm how do u add models? i got the correct .dat files and i put them into my models folder and then i added them ingameâ€¦ it said that the model was addedâ€¦ but when i equip the dclawsâ€¦ it has the correct stats but the image is white clawsâ€¦

Read full topic
